long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension that allows you to cheat on setwithfriends.com

As with any cheat for multiplayer games, it can be fun, maybe once with friends. But do know that playing in public lobbies ruins the fun for others.

It uses a very basic algorithm to find a possible set.

It has two functions:
1. Do combination (Finds a combination and submits it for you)
2. Find combination (Finds a combination but only highlights it for you)
